entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High minus 14.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 14. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 20 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 15.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 15. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Friday 20 January 2023
